name: Marine South East Ltd
legal: Company limited by guarantee (not for profit)
goal:
Marine Knowledge & Innovation Cluster of over 2000 Companies in the SE of England.

Delivering Blue Growth Agenda for SMEs and liaising with other Regional Clusters across Europe.
